alert.note: Alert for Dade; Jasper; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 12:51AM CDT until April 11 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri... Eastern Jasper County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Dade County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1251 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Golden City to Joplin, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Joplin... Carthage... Webb City... Mount Vernon... Carterville... Duquesne... Greenfield... Sarcoxie... Duenweg... Lockwood... Miller... Everton... Carytown... Fidelity... Stotts City... Halltown... Avilla... La Russell... Brooklyn Heights... Reeds... This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 10 and 39, and between mile markers 51 and 58. Interstate 49 between mile markers 36 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
